scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:functions && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy:dev: firebase use dev && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use prod && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.test:rules: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,storage --project demo-mcmp "npm --workspace functions run test:rules:jest"
scripts.test:integration: npm --workspace functions run build && SOCIAL_ENABLED=true firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage --project demo-mcmp "npm --workspace functions run test:integration:jest"
